title: [VISUAL] Desperada Cassiopeia - Visual Bug
body:
While death as "Desperada Cassiopeia" after few seconds your champion avatar changes back to classic Cassiopeia skin, and then comes back when you have respawned.

1. Die
2. Wait few seconds

I dont know if this happens on other Cassiopeia skins, because i dont have different one so i can't check it out.

https://ibb.co/fyhBev
https://ibb.co/bP3jzv

replies.body:
Hey Annoying Clown! 

We've updated some portraits for 7.17, and this issue doesn't appear to be occurring on my end anymore. This should be fixed for 7.17. Lemme know if you're still having issues when the new patch goes out. :)
